long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Provides you with a "inspection/quick-view" of the best matching answer from stackoverflow, related to your google search, in the right hand side of your google search results. A simple way of making your search iterations more efficient as a developer.

Selecting the stackinspector- extension, available in the "extensions" section of your browser, lets you configure the following display settings:  

 - Font-size
 - Width (making it possible for users to override the automatically calculated width 
   of the displayed answer)
 - Code-color theme


Pull requests are welcome: https://github.com/teslae1/stackinspector
